name: Elude Cthulhu!
description:
Eldritch horror has descended upon a sleepy town! It's a very stressful situation for all involved.

Help guide your witless villagers to safety in this twist on a 2D RTS. Deal with unique villager traits as they defy your orders while the unknowable blackness snakes it's way towards their feeble souls.

Made in 48 hours as part of the GMTK 2020 GameJam!
